column2: Best Offline-Wiki-App Full Wikipedia (eng) needs 10gb off sd-space. Searching in the whole dictionary works superfast. Also math-formulas get shown right with this app. Thanks for this great app!

Perfect for offline Wikipedia A recent (April 2012) compressed copy of the whole Wikipedia is available (takes just 10GB). The latest Aard version doesn't work on Android 1.6 devices like Archos 5IT/48
